name: Blind Jumps
description:
( This is my first ever game :0 )

Are you ready? Ready for the HARDEST 3D platformer you will play? It starts off slow, just a few jumps, and your done. But that is only the start. Every jump is harder than the last. They get more and more challenging, while also being simpler and simpler. So I ask you once more, are you ready?
